root.name: Enemy Engaged 2
root.description: OverviewLike in the previous Enemy Engaged title, the player can choose between the RAH-66 Comanche and the Ka-52 Hokum, and three different war scenarios - Lebanon, Taiwan and Korea. It was widely criticized for just being a reissue of the then 7 year old predecessor, using graphical enhancements made by the mod community in 2005 (after the original game was made open source).An stand-alone expansion was released in 2008, Enemy Engaged 2: Desert Operations, adding three new scenarios. In 2009 Enemy Engaged 2 Gold was released, including both Enemy Engaged 2 and it's expansion.
